docket_entries.description: Order (Final) (I) Determining that Utility Companies have been Provided with Adequate Assurance of Payment; (II) Prohibiting Utility Companies from Altering, Refusing or Discontinuing Service on Account of Prepetition Invoices; and (III) Approving Adequate Assurance Procedures (related document(s) 5 ) Order Signed on 2/15/2010. (NAL) (Entered: 02/16/2010)
Order Authorizing Employment and Retention of Lovells LLP as Attorneys Nunc Pro Tunc to Petition Date (related document(s) 12 ) Order Signed on 2/15/2010. (NAL) (Entered: 02/16/2010)

Order Authorizing Employment and Retention of Bayard, P.A. as Debtors' Delaware Counsel Nunc Pro Tunc to Petition Date (related document(s) 32, 47 ) Order Signed on 2/15/2010. (NAL) (Entered: 02/16/2010)

Order (Final): (1) Authorizing Debtors-In-Possession to Use Cash Collateral; (2) Authorizing Debtors-In-Possession to Incur Post-=Petition Financing and Secured Obligations; (3) Granting Security Interests and Priority; (4) Granting Adequate Protection; (5) Modifying Automatic Stay; and (6) Granting Related Relief (related document(s) 6, 45 ) Order Signed on 2/16/2010. (Attachments: # 1 Annex A) (NAL) (Entered: 02/16/2010)
